<div align=center><h1>GitTheme</h1>
<p>
A simple Discord theme recolour inspired by <a href=https://github.com/MarkChan0225/RoundedDiscord>RoundedDiscord</a> and <a href=https://github.com/mwittrien/BetterDiscordAddons/tree/master/Themes/DiscordRecolor>DiscordRecolour</a>.</p>
<div align="center">

## Download ðŸ“©

* From [Releases](https://github.com/Derisorant/Discord-GitTheme/releases/latest)

## Usage ðŸ¤š
### [BetterDiscord](https://betterdiscord.app/)
After downloading, place the `GitTheme.css` file in your `Themes` folder. If you don't know how to locate the themes folder, follow this [Guide](https://betterdiscord.app/FAQ#:~:text=Open%20your%20discord%20user%20settings,"Open%20themes%20folder"%20button.).

### [VenCord](https://vencord.dev/)
After downloading, place the `GitTheme.css` file in your `Themes` folder. This can be found in `Discord -> Settings -> Themes -> Open Themes Folder`
